name: Life of Glazed
description:
You are a donut that was abandoned by your owner (the one who made you) because he was unsatisfied with the appearance. You, as a donut, are too plain, doesn’t appeal to his customer at all thus, decreasing his revenue. Having gained a new ability to prove yourself and get yourself sold, your mission is to beautify yourself by using the donut equipment in the store, whilst making sure that no one catches you

You play as a plain doughnut and the goal of the game is to gather resources to beautify yourself and sell yourself to the customers. In order to beautify yourself, you will have to get all the toppings required to be perfect. 1. Sprinkles 2. Chocolate Frosting 3. Oven All these three toppings will be represented by a stat bar shown in the game. You will need to fill up the bars accordingly whilst making sure that you do not overdo it, which will therefore affect the second stat, the quality bar. At the end of the game, your task is to lie back on the display shelf, with the game ending and the ending cutscene playing. After the cutscene, the scoreboard will appear to see how well you did.
